welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oud-Beijerland! Known for its charming streets and beautiful countryside, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and history of our lovely city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
